titleStmt.title: Zions rjghts and babels rvine, or, The Church restored to her primitive lustre a treatise concerning the essence and subsistence of the christian church defecated and purged from the dregges of erroneous humane invention and erected by the vnerrable patterne of the Word of God / by William Fenwick.
titleStmt.author: Fenwick, William, 1616 or 17-ca. 1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. N. for Lawrence Blacklocke and Edw. Husbands ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
